title: Rockstar Admin VA for 6-Figure Coaching Business (Webinars, Emails, Community Access)
job_overview:
???? READ THIS BEFORE APPLYING
This is NOT your average admin VA job. We're looking for a self-starter who has real-world experience supporting coaches, course creators, and online communities.

If you’ve worked behind-the-scenes in launches, handled messy inboxes, or saved a coaching CEO from tech chaos — this job is for you

Your Role (Day-to-Day Responsibilities)
???? Manage coaching portal access (create/update logins, troubleshoot access issues)

???? Respond to client/student emails with empathy and accuracy

???? Set up email sequences in platforms like GoHighLevel, Kajabi, or Mailchimp

???? Help coordinate webinars, Zoom calls, and community events

? Track onboarding progress for new students/members

????? Maintain Google Drive folders, files, and process docs

Support students with basic tech help ("I can’t log in" or "Where’s my bonus PDF?")

???? Prepare and organize SOPs, feedback forms, client notes, etc.


???? Tools You Should Already Know (or Learn Fast)
GoHighLevel (preferred) or similar CRMs

Kajabi / Teachable / Thinkific (or similar course platforms)

Zoom (webinar settings, recordings, etc.)

Slack / Email / Google Workspace

Canva (a plus but not required)

ChatGPT (to write short, helpful replies)

? Ideal Candidate Must Be…
???? Fluent in English (spoken + written)

???? A tech-savvy problem solver — not afraid of troubleshooting

???? Detail-oriented with strong follow-through

??????? Calm under pressure and deadline-driven

??????? A self-starter who takes ownership (don’t wait to be micromanaged)

???? Passionate about serving mission-driven entrepreneurs

Bonus Points If You’ve Ever…
Worked directly with a course creator or coach

Supported a live launch or webinar funnel

Built email automations or CRM campaigns

Been the "glue" in a small, fast-paced team

???? What You’ll Get
???? Long-term, stable opportunity with room to grow

???? Ongoing training and support

???? Recognition, bonuses, and incentives for high performers

?? A team that actually cares about your growth
???? How to Apply
Send the following to Upgrade to see actual info 

Your updated resume

A 1-minute voice recording introducing yourself and describing your experience with online coaches or course creators

Screenshots or links to tools you’ve used (GHL, Kajabi, Zoom, etc.)

Tell us: What’s your secret to staying organized when things get crazy?
